hooks.command: node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{const i=JSON.parse(d);const p=i.tool_input?.file_path||'';if(/\.(md|txt)$/.test(p)&&!/(README|CLAUDE|AGENTS|CONTRIBUTING)\.md$/.test(p)&&!/\.claude[\\\\/]plans[\\\/]/.test(p)&&!/openspec[\\\/]/.test(p)){console.error('[Hook] BLOCKED: Unnecessary documentation file creation');console.error('[Hook] File: '+p);console.error('[Hook] Use README.md for documentation instead');process.exit(2)}}catch{}console.log(d)})"

PreToolUse.description: Allow .md files in openspec/ directory - project uses OpenSpec for change management
